Photo: Wilf Thorne, For The Chronicle Image 11 of 11 Who are the Greater Houston Area's best running backs? 1 / 11 Back to Gallery 
Sure the spread offense is as popular as ever and you'll find all over the state at every level. And sure that means quarterbacks and wide receivers are the "it" positions nowadays. 
But as most coaches will tell you, running the football is still needed to be successful. Houston has some of the state's best running backs. 
Click through the gallery above to see 10 running backs having stellar seasons and ones to keep on your radar.
